creator: M800 Limited
descriptionHtml:
Stay connected with your global customers and colleagues wherever you go. Subscribe to our Essentials Plan for free!

maaiiconnect is a secure, cloud-based, all-in-one customer engagement and internal collaboration platform that provides businesses with robust calling and messaging capabilities.

Transform the way you engage your customers with crystal-clear voice calls and cross-platform chat. Start or join meetings with your colleagues. Track and manage your conversations, so you can stay productive and never miss any important inquiries or interactions.



KEY FEATURES:

**Call to anywhere
Make carrier-grade voice and video calls to anyone, anytime, with any phone number.

**Live chat across any channel
Engage your customers and colleagues with informative multimedia content.

**Your work day at a glance
Access and attend to customer inquiries and your most recent connections immediately at your Workspace.

**Manage your customer interactions
Monitor and analyze real-time communication logs to manage incoming, ongoing, reopened, and missed customer inquiries.

**Keep in touch with your colleagues
Instantly connect with your team using the Staff Phonebook, and make calls or chat directly from there.

**Personalize your account
Set your personal preferences and availability from the mobile app, and they will be synchronized to the other devices you’re logged on.



KEY BENEFITS:

**Increased customer satisfaction and retention
Customer inquiries are attended to immediately, reducing call or cart abandonment rates and overall dissatisfaction.

**Enhanced productivity
Seamlessly switch from maaiiConnect Dashboard to the mobile app and engage with your customers and colleagues from anywhere.

**Collaboration made simple
Call or send a message to any of your colleagues anytime and enhance the level of staff engagement and team productivity.

**Easy onboarding
Both the mobile app and Dashboard share the same UI, so you can onboard new staff faster.


Visit www.maaiiconnect.com now and subscribe to our Essentials Plan FOR FREE!

Questions? Email our customer contact center at support@maaiiconnect.com
descriptionShort: Your 360° communication suite for customer engagement and team collaboration

appDetails.developerAddress:
21/F Tower 1 Enterprise Square,
9 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
maaiiconnect brand refresh
- The new brand identity represents a new era in customer engagement and internal team collaboration.
Conference call
- Staff can now initiate a conference call with anyone, anywhere in the world.
Call recording
- Admin can now set what calls to be recorded and when to record.
Other Improvements
- Call log: Staff can now view more details for each call log in a chat room.
- My Account: Staff can now see their own QR code and web link Inquiry URLs.

appDetails.developerAddress:
21/F Tower 1 Enterprise Square,
9 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Channel Manager
- A Facebook Page can now be linked as an omnichannel inquiry type. Staff can pick up the onmichannel inquiry and perform the same functions as they would on other inquiries.

Voicemail
- Customers can now leave a voicemail message if there are no agents available to pick up the call. Missed inquiries with voicemail will be visible in the Inquiry Overview.

Calls
- Staff can now do 1-on-1 video calls.
- Staff can now initiate conference calls without creating a Space first.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Conference video call
- Participants can now enable their videos during a conference call.
- Participants can now see who enabled their videos (single view) during the call.
- Hosts and co-hosts can now mute all participants.

Chat inquiry transfer
- Staff can now transfer an ongoing visitor chat inquiry to another Staff member or a Tag.

Calls tab
- Staff can now view and access the following in one place: All Calls, Missed Calls, and Keypad.

Various bug fixes and improvements.

21/F Tower 1 Enterprise Square,
9 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong

creator: M800 Limited
descriptionHtml:
CINNOX is an innovative customer engagement and analytics platform that humanises connections for better business. Connect, orchestrate, and evaluate all of your employee and customer interactions through a unified platform, automated workflows, and actionable insights.

Never miss an opportunity, always reply in an instant with a human touch. The CINNOX mobile app makes customer support and team collaboration easier than ever before:

- Receive enquiries from customer’s preferred communication channel
- Visualise the customer journey in a single pane view
- Swap between communication channels, or even initiate a video call or conference call
- Route enquiries or forward calls to the most suited staff

Install the CINNOX app on your mobile to stay on top of customer enquiries anywhere and keep delivering that fantastic service you’re known for.

CINNOX: Humanise Connections for Better Business. Use the CINNOX web platform to power the total experience of your business:

Elevate Customer Experiences:
- Customers can engage with your business on any channel they prefer at any time
- Improve first time resolution by connecting them to the right agent for a given situation
- Reduce wait time through automation and “always on” support at every touchpoint, at scale
- Offer seamless switching between voice, video, conferencing, across telecom and digital channels to best match the type of response needed

Optimise Employee Experiences:
- Collaborate and escalate efficiently to facilitate timely resolution of complex customer enquiries
- Analyse interaction data to improve team performance and actionable business strategies

Visit our website www.cinnox.com to learn more about how you can connect, orchestrate, and evaluate for better business.

appDetails.developerAddress:
21/F Tower 1 Enterprise Square,
9 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
CINNOX elevates your customer and employee experiences through innovative omnichannel engagement and analytics.


LINE Integration
Receive and answer enquiries made to LINE Official Accounts connected to your service account.



Bug fixes
We release updates regularly and are always looking for ways to make CINNOX better.

CINNOX is an innovative customer engagement and analytics platform that humanises connections for better business. Connect, orchestrate, and evaluate all of your employee and customer interactions through a unified platform, automated workflows, and actionable insights.

Never miss an opportunity, always reply in an instant with a human touch. The CINNOX mobile app makes customer support and team collaboration easier than ever before:

- Receive enquiries from customer’s preferred communication channel
- Visualise the customer journey in a single pane view
- Swap between communication channels, or even initiate a video call or conference call
- Route enquiries or forward calls to the most suited staff

Install the CINNOX app on your mobile to stay on top of customer enquiries anywhere and keep delivering that fantastic service you’re known for.

CINNOX: Humanise Connections for Better Business. Use the CINNOX web platform to power the total experience of your business:

Elevate Customer Experiences:
- Customers can engage with your business on any channel they prefer at any time
- Improve first time resolution by connecting them to the right agent for a given situation
- Reduce wait time through automation and “always on” support at every touchpoint, at scale
- Offer seamless switching between voice, video, conferencing, across telecom and digital channels to best match the type of response needed

Optimise Employee Experiences:
- Collaborate and escalate efficiently to facilitate timely resolution of complex customer enquiries
- Analyse interaction data to improve team performance and actionable business strategies

Visit our website www.cinnox.com to learn more about how you can connect, orchestrate, and evaluate for better business.

appDetails.developerAddress:
21/F Tower 1 Enterprise Square,
9 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s New!
Salesforce Integration
- Seamlessly sync chat and call records as cases on Salesforce
- Automatically update contact details between CINNOX and Salesforce

Device Input/ Output Selection (Web Only)
- Switch to a different microphone or speaker device during a call

Shake your phone to share feedback with us!

appDetails.developerAddress:
21/F Tower 1 Enterprise Square,
9 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s New in Version 3.2.0

We’re adding Email to the CINNOX platform!

Create an Email Channel to connect Gmail & Outlook
Reply from both the Web Dashboard & Mobile App
Use intelligent routing rules for email enquiries
Transfer and consolidate email enquiries, and add contacts
Email data added to dashboard and reporting functions
Track added, updated, & deleted email in the Audit Log
Other Updates

Japanese is now supported
UI Enhancements made for Web Dashboard & Mobile App

21/F Tower 1 Enterprise Square,
9 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Staff can now:

Automatically close enquiries that have been inactive for a while

Add custom info per channel, such as procedure and operation details helpful to the staff serving enquiries

Transcribe recorded calls and audio messages and catch the conversation details instantly

Switch from the ongoing 1:1 call to the conference call and invite people to join the discussion without the need to hang up the call

Send SMS, SMS OTP and do more using the Open API SMS endpoints
